name: Super Snow Ball
description:
A little and very short game made for the RPG Maker Day, Mini-game Challenge of February 2020 from the RPG Maker official Forums (RMW)! 

Enter a dimension of snow and ice where you need to learn to push snow balls to progress through levels! Puzzles start off easy, but they become difficult the more you progress! Your goal is to meet the legendary MushroomCake28 at the end of the dimension, after completing all puzzles!

This short game is meant to be played in 10 to 30 minutes (depending on how fast you solve the puzzles!). 

For more information about the event, visit the event's thread on the RPG Maker official forums: https://forums.rpgmakerweb.com/index.php?threads/rpg-maker-day-mini-game-challen...

Credits:

  • Avery (for the mushroom character asset!)
  • Finnuval (the mushroom avatar, used as a face here!)
  • Kadokawa/Degica for the RTP resources.
  • Everything else is made by me! (plugins and music)
